website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded tool that improves the capabilities of any roadside repair toolkit.
pros: Plugs into your vehicle’s cigarette lighter to fill tires with a maximum PSI rating of 150
Able to fill sports balls, rafts, air mattresses, and more with included adapters, all of which fit inside the carrying case
Equipped with digital LED display, 10-foot power cord, and 23.6-inch air hose
cons: Inflates tires more slowly than many of its rivals

customer_reviews.title: Compressor Does Not meet 120 PSI Requirement
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this item and used it to try and fill the tires on my RV. After filling one tire to 85 PSI the compressor would no longer run while connected to another RV tire. The compressor works when not connected to a tire. The fuse is not blown the LED reading correctly reads the tire PSI BUT as mentioned the compressor will not run when connected to my RV tire. I will be returning this item for a full refund and will buy a different compressor for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: JBHD

customer_reviews.title: Good value; Works for my purposes so far
customer_reviews.text: This compressor seems like a good value vs. brand-name/competitors. I bought it for airing-up tires after 4-wheeling. Yesterday, I used it for the first time to air up P265/70R17 tires from ~19PSI to ~35PSI. Took me a total of 13min to get all 4 tires to pressure (including time to move from tire-to-tire). Pump did not shut-off or overheat. It also seems to run very quietly compared to other compressors I've seen/heard. Included hose is plenty long enough to reach all 4 tires of a 4Runner. I did notice that the pump does not shut-off once reaching set pressure but need to try again (although this seems consistent w/ other reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zboray

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far. Used to inflate SUV tyres and scooter. Pretty quiet for a little compressor and the flexi pipe that comes with it is also handy and good quality. Quick connection fitting is handy! Power plugs are big and sturdy. Definitely recommend this little product for the back of the truck. It also comes with adapters to inflate toys and balls etc. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gearing

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it it's junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to air the tires on my RAM 3500 Dually. the first problem is the hose you can't hook another end on it to do the inner tires. On the outside this takes forever to pump up a tire to 80psi and I have 6.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeMac

customer_reviews.title: Not very safe, slow
customer_reviews.text: Cigarette adapter got VERY hot. Left a little burn/blister on my thumb and melted the adapter tip. Be careful, especially with kids. On top of that, it ran for 7 mins, but only added 4 psi to my car tire. Plenty of others love it, so maybe mine is a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Dean G

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough.
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to the single pump cigarette lighter models and this battery clamp model blew me away. It’s as fast as the gas station pumps for sure and it’s way quieter than any other portable unit I’ve used. I’m using this on LT truck tires too! The only negative I’ve found is that I have to set the psi on it +2 for my TPMS sensors to read exactly 40 psi. Easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Missing feet
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work okay. Quality control needs improvement. Mine was missing two of the four rubber feet out-of-the-box. The electrical wire could use a couple of extra feet for those of us that have large vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good Except For One Glaring Problem
customer_reviews.text: They did a pretty good job with this item except that they cheaped out on the chuck. As it is, you can fill the tire to whatever pressure you like (which it does pretty well) but by the time you unscrew the stupid chuck from the tire stem some unknown quantity of air has leaked. Then you have to use a separate tire gauge to check again then re-attach the compressor and fill again, overshooting the mark hoping to compensate for the inevitable leakage when disconnecting. Lather, rinse, repeat. Had they not pinched pennies on the chuck and used a decent quick disconnect they might have gotten a 4.5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGaw

customer_reviews.title: A good small compressor
customer_reviews.text: Update: Well, it failed about a month ago. The coiled hose screw-on tip which attaches to the tire valve broke while I was trying to screw it on to inflate the tire. The temp was 18F. The cold temp may have had something to do with it. So I'm forced to downgrade my rating since it should have not broken. So far, my 5-star rating still holds. Due to a tiny sidewall puncture on a long trip, I've been forced to re-inflate my pick-up truck tire at least twice daily for the past week. The compressor performed flawlessly. I just purchased a replacement tire. This compressor will stay in my truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Broke second time using it. Not a thumb latch shrader, it's a screw on. As screwing it on the valve stem of there tire the shrader came apart in 2 pieces from the air hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Quick & easy! But leaks air when connecting/ disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Work fast & it’s super easy! Only con is you loose some air when your connect and disconnect to the tire. So will need to pump up a little bit higher psi to allow for that air loss when disconnecting. Otherwise, it’s sooooo much better than the awful gas station air pumps!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Already used it a handful of times and the only real issue is that the pump doesn't automatically stop when you hit the set PSI, the display just stops increasing and you have to manually stop the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fast inflator, aligator battery clips with 30 amp fuse, quiet. Auto off is very strange....
customer_reviews.text: Fast n flat or fora portable and with a ligature clips and 30 amp fuse...serious power. The auto shutoff is tricky. Once it reaches the set pressure you want, the display freezes that number, the pump keeps running, overshoot for about a minute and over inflates by about 2.5 psi. My guess is they anticipated air loss when unthreading the fitting from the valve stem and gave the slowest fingers the priority. I observed 2 suburban tires inflate from 65- 67 psi to 80 in about 70 seconds which is very impressivery for a 12volt portable.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbaloooo

customer_reviews.title: Nice little compressor that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Have used the unit twice (8 tires) and I like that it is quiet, compared to my other compressor, and has little vibration. It's lightweight and fits nicely in the bag provided. Although the compressor doesn't shut off after filling the tire, it does stop pumping once it reaches your setting. If I turn off the pump the tire loses about 2 lbs. before I can disconnect the hose, so I found it was better to leave it run a few more seconds while I disconnect the hose, as opposed to adding 2 lbs. to the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut-off did not work
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive Lightweight/portable Quieter than I expected Filled my C rated 265/70/17 tires quickly Cons: Auto shut-off does not work Air leaks from the end of the hose unless pressed firmly and held during airing process I ended up returning the air compressor since the auto-shut off did not work and since the end of the hose leaked air. The hose worked fine the first time I used it and then broke the second time. I guess I learned why this unit was quite a bit cheaper compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Pella

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time on a camping trip right after purchase, worked fine. Went to use it a couple months later, the valve broke off the hose. Cheap junk. Have had it for only 2.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel!!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Portable Compressor because I had a nail in the tire of my Jeep that the local repair shop refused to take out since it was at the edge of the zone. After repairing the tire, I used the compressor to refill my tire. I was a little hesitant since it is rather small and compact, but it worked great. My husband, as well as I, have now used it several times to refill our tires when needed. I am glad I bought the compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expectations
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old one. Way quiter and more accurate. My last one the need would bounce the nozzle would fall off and take like 5 mins a tire. Now I'm at a min a tire to the right pressure and my eardrums are intact!
customer_reviews.author: Bad Fish

customer_reviews.title: Really fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: You set it to the desired pressure and let it run. It is very fast. One thing though, even if the gauge says it is done, let it run until it stops on it’s own at the preset pressure, otherwise it will not actually be at the preset pressure even if the gauge is saying it is.
customer_reviews.author: jopi

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Nice to have separate storage for the hose and the electrical cord. I used this air compressor no more than 10 times. Suddenly it is stuck on a PSI that is less than what I need for my car's tires. I go through the steps to increase that value. It seems to take - but then goes right back to the PSI that is useless to me. Such a waste to have this product turn into junk after less than a year. I will be distrustful of any more Amazon Basics offerings.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: All is well with this little gem
customer_reviews.text: I've had some time to play with it now and all is well. It is reasonably close to a trusted air guage and the only nagging concern is that the brass threaded coupling may give out. Until it does 9only a feeling so far)... I'm very happy indeed with this little gem.
customer_reviews.author: sal3

customer_reviews.title: Worked well once
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it worked great. The next time I went to use it, it turned off early. I assumed maybe it was the cold because it was snowing out. Tried to use it a third time and again, it just shut off shortly after turning on. Pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: This pump works!!
customer_reviews.text: Will take my BFG T/A KO2 tires from 25psi to 45 psi in about 3 minutes per tire! Digital gauge shuts down about 2lb early but that's ok as I just set the auto gauge a little high!. Did all four tires and pump barely got warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Has selectable PSI & bars for air pressure. Shuts air flow off when programmed air pressure is reached. I thought it would turn off the compressor but, it does not. The cable & hose fit neatly in place. If needed, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Portable Pump
customer_reviews.text: My son brought this powerful portable pump today from Round Rock, TX, USA to Bangalore, India. I tested it today itself. It took less than a minute to top up from 29 psi to 33 psi in 215/60, R16 tires of my Tata Nexon XZA+ AMT Diesel. The pump shuts itself down a few seconds after achieving the target set. I checked with the analog pressure gauge. The figures are damn accurate and uniform in all the 4 tires. I am fully satisfied. Excellent. Capital. Superb.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this pump, I was surprised at how fast this pump worked. Since then, the handle broke off, and I was unable to use it to fill a truck tire. It wouldn't go past 50 PSI. The carry case could use some simple improvements such as a small zipper pocket for the spare fuse and needle attachment. I would also have the zipper open at the side, and not in the middle, as its hard to take the machine in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Meir F

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. Aired up my tires on my jeep after playing in the dunes without problem, and without getting hot. The gauge reads high, but I was able to watch the readout on my dash and stop at the right psi. The only thing that could be better was including at least a cheap tire gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Travis C. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I Did Not Know What To Order
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as one of his Christmas gifts. It is 12 volts and runs from the car battery. He already has one that does not run from the car battery that is more powerful. We passed this along to a friend, who will use it to blow up float toys for his grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Action/Suspense Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love the auto-stop feature. Easy enough for wife to use. Also like the screw-on connector, which is leak-proof, albeit a bit slower to operate. Perfect device to keep in each car.
customer_reviews.author: LazyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Keep this in your vehicle. It puts to shame all of those plug in the cigarette lighter type compressors. My work van has 80 PSI on the rear tires and this will fully inflate one of them in under 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend another product
customer_reviews.text: It's small,light weight, and it works kind of well.... It's annoying and hard to fold and store the power cable. The tip that goes on the valve is Terrible. It always leaks when you remove it. Look for another on.
customer_reviews.author: Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Very poor refurb dept
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurb. It was D.O.A. Probably memory chip .. 100% waste of MY time and AMZN's profit profile. Someone was obviously sleeping on the job at AMZN Refurb Dept. This would never be tolerated in most big firms.
customer_reviews.author: Urko

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I have three cars and a air pump in each all old hoses broke I order 2 like I had one amazon basic with I had got three amazon basic fill up regular car tire very very fast a longer on pickup tires bag tore apart had to order a new one pump still work great
customer_reviews.author: Joe john

customer_reviews.title: Fast and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great for topping off a tire when the car's tire pressure monitor warning goes off. Great for maintaining the spare's pressure. Gauge appears to be accurate, at least according to the dial gauge I keep in my glove box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great basic compressor for any car that may need a fill up
customer_reviews.text: Like the LED display which makes it easy to read at night. works like a charm, out 2 for 2 buys. only thing silly is plastic bag for extras are shoved in base, they will not stay with device long.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Oles

customer_reviews.title: No problems.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a issue so far. I do use it regularly, only complaint is that the psi shown is not accurate but it's a non issue for me as I do have a separate tool.
customer_reviews.author: AmitPhilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. So pleased I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Best little thing I could have bought for the car. No problems with it and hubby want’s one for himself now.
customer_reviews.author: Eilsel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Compact air compressor that does a good job. Sorry PSI gauge is off by+15 PSI. Inflated tires to 35 PSI or so I thought! My BMW 4 Series clocked the tires at +50. Nice compressor but don't trust the gauge!
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Man in Central Florida

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. THIS GARBAGE DOES NOT EVEN BEGIN TO INFLATE OR EVEN TURN ON THE COMPRESSOR.
customer_reviews.text: What a useless piece of junk. This thing doesn't even turn on the compressor, much less inflate a tire. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Did not last more two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Used twice. Would not turn on. Went back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Husky

customer_reviews.title: good for the$$
customer_reviews.text: compact and iam surprised it lasted this long ism terrible on these compressors have issue with over heating fuse
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Christmas gifts to the family
customer_reviews.text: I have used this air compressor for two months now. The dual pistons move more air and the time to fill a truck tire or trailer tire is much faster. I have also used it to fill tractor tires after repairs. The power clamps hold well and the cord is heavy enough for farm work.
customer_reviews.author: cgc3iii

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you simply set the pressure you want, engage the nozzle, turn it on and it automatically shuts off when it hits the right pressure. Simple!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable compressor. The best one I have ever used (this is the 3rd one I have owned). About 5 minutes to fill a flat car tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times. It does get hot, read the directions and follow them. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.text: This compressor can’t be beat for the money. AmazonBasics all the way! This one replaces another make/model I had for many years that finally died. This one is so small and quite and fills tires so much faster than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Autocompressor
customer_reviews.text: A good compressor for car tires, one drawback is noisy, but a large dignity of a current of 8 amps can be connected to a cigarette lighter outlet, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mark Korol

customer_reviews.title: Small compact 12v air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fit in cubby hole of C7 vette. Bought another for wifes car. Time will tell how it works
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. My bf uses it for off-roading. Has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Connector fitting broke after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for about 1.5 years and have only used it a half dozen times. I keep it in the trunk for emergencies. I just went to air up one of my tires (36psi) and the brass tire fitting shot off as it was airing up. The unit itself is very nice and quiet and airs up quickly but the fitting should not have broken after such little actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked twice, now broken and cannot return. 70 dollars for two uses... come on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Limited durability
customer_reviews.text: 5 months past warranty (which is one year) and not working. It looked like a durable product, but sadly not. I can't recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: calex

customer_reviews.title: Portable Air Compressor
customer_reviews.text: This compressor is the one I wanted. It basically is being used to air up my mower tires, so it is easy to use. Just attach it to the battery and go. I have also used it on one of my tires of my pickup. It doesn't take forever to air up like my previous compressors. I am glad I selected this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudo Self

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to keep in my camper, I like that you can set the pressure.

customer_reviews.title: Good if youare able to fix yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Bought used listed as cosmetic damage .but the hoses leak will not work over23 lbs pressure starts leaking out of fitting
customer_reviews.author: paul jr

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, light did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The pump itself works well and easy to use. The light did not function so a replacement had to be requested thus the three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 15 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Sat in my truck for about 45 days. Plugged in to add some air to trailer tires before a trip, ran for a whole 15 seconds and DEAD. Might as well have burned the cash instead of ordering this paperweight. Very frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comvenienr
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however the zipper on the bag was broken on arrival. Convenient and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: SMonjazeb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tire pump
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great value for money everything I'd come to expect from Amazon line of products filled my rear truck tires up to 80psi no problem
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with a bit of improvement.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product but takes a bit of time when filling. It needs a bit of an improvement because it takes much time when filling tires.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil

customer_reviews.title: Mean machine
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is digital and can set tire pressure and it stops when it reaches the set pressure I aired up 3 jeeps with 35 inch tires without stopping it never missed a beat and worked great I am going to buy another for my work truck
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your car tires pressure
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been great helping me keeping my car tires pressure, even the spare one that goes up to 60 psi
customer_reviews.author: Luis L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Does the job well blowing air.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Portable Air Compressor
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fast and easy to use. Much better that any I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Floyd

customer_reviews.title: This is the biggest piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: 2nd tire and the seal on the connector to the tire broke. What a piece of crap!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This compressor is well build, fast in operation. Mine is new, less than two months, but it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tadese Steven Adeniyi

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 4th tire.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on first 3 tires, then end that connects to valve on tire broke when triedvto attatch to fourth valve stem. Now compressor useless.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing. Fills my 33" tires without overheating
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost a year now and it's held up to multiple jeep trips each month with multiple uses per trip. If it dies tomorrow, I'd feel like I got my $ worth.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and portable
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I keep it in the back of my vehicle and it has came in handy so many times.
customer_reviews.author: MonsterMom17

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pump for the price
customer_reviews.text: This little guy stands up to the big name brands
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lavery

customer_reviews.title: Short cables and poor quiality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality the valvules that are attached to the tires. Neet to pay extra to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Hermann Achoy

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Tried in two vehicles. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Must have for car.
customer_reviews.text: The gauge seems a bit off, but otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: bobby sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's fast, much faster inflating than my old compressors. Seems also to be pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: G van Nieuwenhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,and easy to store away
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandfather and he loves it says it super easy for him to use
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy and quick. Helpful when in a pinch with car tires
customer_reviews.author: Storm sister

customer_reviews.title: Nothing  Better !
customer_reviews.text: This Pump really works ! You will be Amazed !
customer_reviews.author: Huds

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air
customer_reviews.text: Pretty powerful, but easy to lose air as the end screws on, and when you take it off of the stem it leaks
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Concept, Poor Execution (CCPE)
customer_reviews.text: Thought I could save some time with this product, but it ended up blowing the fuse in my car. The irony! Now I have to fix the fuse in my car. Sadly, I can't return the product because it's too late. That's why I'm writing this review. Cool Concept, Poor Execution (CCPE).
customer_reviews.author: Cole Brantmeier

customer_reviews.title: Will never use a 12v air compressor again.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely worth the trouble to attach to the battery. Husband says this is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C

customer_reviews.title: Great partner for the trails!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty strong little beast and much quieter than expected. It’ll be great to have this out on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for even off rod vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1999 Surburban K2500. The cord on this is long enough to reach all four tires. I have used this to pump up my tires front and back using the lighter plug in on the dash. works great.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Rehmel

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Really good, comes with a nice case, great price too, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Milot

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Portable 12-Volt Air Compressor with Carrying Case
feature_bullets: 12-volt portable air compressor for adding air to tires; plugs into cigarette lighter
For tires with a 120 PSI rating; 1.06 CFM free flow at 0 PSI; 10-foot power cord
Long 27.5-inch air hose easily reaches all tires; easy-to-read digital gauge and LED light
Can be used to add air to basketballs, air mattresses, and more; includes ball-inflation needle, 2 rubber blow tips, and carrying case
Digital Gauge with Auto Shut Off Capability - Simple rotating pre-set dial automatically stops at desired pressure
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited 1-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,594 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
